level.heading: Notification of decision and right to judicial review.
level.text: The Mayor's agent shall transmit his or her written decision and any further written statement required by § 4-210.12 to the claimant. If the decision is adverse to the claimant, the Mayor's agent shall notify him or her of his or her right to judicial review.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.
